segments.text: Good evening . We've a reservation for a table for four . My name is Tim .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check the list . Yes , we do have a reservation under Mr . Tim .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But there is a change in the number of people . There are seven of us . Three of my friends are coming soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . Follow me , please . What do you think of the table in the center of the dining room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's a window table that we've booked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but you see , all the tables by the window are small , with up to 4 seats .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . We'll have to make up with the center one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your understanding , Mr . Tim .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If a Mr . Wu comes to look for me , just take him here .
segments.speaker: S2
